title: This One Is Just a Special Complete Renovation!!
description:
This one is just special. Complete renovation that transformed a cool loft into a modern masterpiece. This expansive space features two bedrooms (both fully-enclosed), two baths and more than 1300 square feet with views of the city skyline. The kitchen was reconfigured and upgraded with stainless steel KitchenAid appliances, custom charred oak upper shelving and a custom high top island. Custom woodwork (throughout unit) created by local, modern design firm, Studio Cidra. A glass partition was installed between the kitchen and the master bedroom for privacy and full enclosure. Custom sill for the window ledge and charred oak cabinets along the living room wall frame the stunning fireplace accent wall. This wall was treated with dark Venetian plaster to give the space warmth and dimensionality. Both bathrooms were fully renovated with luxury finishes. Master, en-suite bath features a new custom vanity and a walk-in shower with custom shower glass. Second bathroom offers a shower/bathtub and provides access to utility closet with stacked, front load washer and dryer. Refinished hardwood floors throughout bring additional warmth to the space, as well as, rustic charm. Custom closets installed in the bedrooms and hallway offer extensive storage. What more could this stunner offer? Oh, a covered parking spot in the secure, attached garage. If you’re seeking a luxury space that is not cookie-cutter, this is for you. 2200 Arch Street Condominiums is a full-service, New York-style loft building that offers amazing amenities and has one of the best locations in Center City. Just a short walk from Rittenhouse Square, 30th St Station, Aramark, Morgan Lewis, Comcast the Schuylkill River Trail and the Parkway, everything you need for is within a few blocks. Adding to the convenience are Trader Joe’s and the new Giant Riverwalk, which are directly across the street. This home is within the Greenfield Catchment and includes one (1) covered parking spot.

title: LUXURY 3 BD/3 BA TOWNHOME w/ CENTRAL AC-FINISHED BASEMENT
description:
LUXURY 3 BD/3 BA TOWNHOME w/ CENTRAL AC-FINISHED BASEMENT-ROOF DECK & OFF-STREET PARKING in Prime QUEEN VILLAGE location. Amazing opportunity to live in Bridgeview, a 3 Bedroom/3 Bath Newer Construction townhome community featuring Central AC, hardwood flooring throughout, ceiling fans, all windows w/ blinds, great closets & storage, finished basement, roof deck and off-street parking with fabulous waterfront views located in the Meredith Catchment. The main level is an open concept living space/dining space with a high-end kitchen equipped with beautiful hardwood floors, recessed lighting, quartz countertops, tile backsplash, top of the line appliances and an island with a breakfast bar. There are two spacious bedrooms on the second level -one is en-suite, the other has a hall bath. The oversized primary suite encompasses the entire 3rd floor, it has two huge walk-in closets and large walk-in tile shower with double vanity. The fabulous roof top deck has river/bridge views, electric & water available, and a pilot house with beverage fridge. Finished basement has additional living space -perfect for a gym, media room, home office or playroom -with plenty of additional storage and a private laundry area. Designated 1 car parking space located behind the unit. Super great location, walking distance to Fiore Fine Foods, For Pete’s Sake, Philadelphia Java Company, close to Columbus Blvd shops, supermarkets, restaurants & Public Transportation, minutes from I-76, I-95, Walt Whitman Bridge & Center City. Available 2/1/2023-8/31/2023 at $3550. Possibility of 7 or 19 month lease. Applicants to apply with Management Company, Addendum to be done for 7 months. Applicants have possibility to extend for 12 more months thru Management Company at 3% increase. Tenant pays gas-electric-water and Renters Insurance required. Current tenant pays approximately $72.40 monthly for water. Pets ok/no limit @ flat $75 per month. First Month/Last Month/1 Month Security due at Lease Signing.
740 S Columbus Blvd #59

$2,005 plus all utilities
4 Bedrooms
1 Bathroom
1350 sq. ft.

Stacked Washer/Dryer located in Kitchen
Philadelphia School District; schools close by are Cook-Wissahickon School and Roxborough High School
Cable ready
Ceiling fans throughout home

2nd FL has two Bedrooms with convenient laminate flooring and ceiling fans
Full Hall Bath on 2nd FL is newer with ceramic tile floor
Two additional Bedrooms on 3rd FL have ample Closet space and ceiling fans
Unfinished Basement
Backyard has small patio and is partially fenced to enjoy nice weather
Heat is radiant Gas
Air conditioning by window units, three included, as is
Conveniently close to Manayunk Septa Train Station, Ridge Avenue, Drexell University, University of Pennsylvania, St. Joseph’s University, Philadelphia University, Thomas Jefferson University East Falls Campus, Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia, Ridge Avenue, Wissahickon Valley Park with walking, biking and riding trails, Schuylkill River Trail, Kelly Drive, Lincoln Drive, City Avenue, Center City, I-76 and Philadelphia International Airport
No Pets permitted
No smoking permitted
We are offering a one year lease or longer if needed
Showing by appointment only
Questions / Showing - To schedule a showing please call  show contact info
or visit  https://showmojo.com/l/60efa210c3/
Application Process - There is $50.00 non-refundable application fee and a one-time lease administration fee of $25.00. Applicants must put up three months’ rent to move in (first months’ rent and two (2) months’ security deposit).  Del Val  will review your income(s), credit, rental and employment history and other information in order to verify that you qualify for the property.  To apply online please go to www.delvalproperty.com and click on Tenants, then Rental Application.
Our Resident Benefits Program is included with all Del Val Leases and includes many benefits. One of the benefits is our ZeroDeposit Program using “Obligo.com” which is an alternative to traditional security deposits. For qualified residents this allows you to forego your two (2) months of security deposits. If you elect to participate in our ZeroDeposit Program there are additional fees. For more details please go to our website at www.delvalproperty.com and click on Zero Deposit Program. Additional benefits include Online Rent Payment, Concierge Utility Service, One-time Late Fee Forgiveness, One-time Non-sufficient Funds Forgiveness and many more. The cost for the Resident Benefit Program is $15.00 and is included in your monthly rent.

Malvern, PA 19355

title: Welcome Home to 1712 Green Street, Located on a Quiet 3-Lined Street!!
description:
Great unit located on a quiet tree-lined street in the highly desired Fairmount - Art Museum Area. This two-bedroom bi-level residence offers stunning high ceilings with distinctive art deco details. Large windows provide an abundance of natural light. The space is enhanced by the hardwood flooring and recessed lighting. Enter into the large living room perfect for entertaining and flow right into the kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. The spacious master suite with two closets and full bath are located on this level. Out the back of the home is a stunning outdoor space dedicated to this unit only. A private fenced in back yard awaits for all your outdoor entertaining needs. Moving to the lower level of the unit is a large bedroom with ample closet space, a laundry room, full bath and extra living space for gym, office or media room. Additional storage unit is included in the basement. This home is located just steps to the Art Museum, Schuylkill River Trail, Boathouse Row, and Center City. One block away from the new Green Street Dog Park, the Spring Gardens community gardens, and the premier Roberto Clemente Park & Playground. Enjoy numerous nearby cafes and restaurants. Easy access to the brand new Whole Foods, Target, FedEx Office, and the Retro Fitness gym. Transportation is easy - considered a Walker's Paradise (Walk Score 92), a Biker's Paradise (Bike Score 95), and excellent access to bus routes and the Broad Street Subway Line.This is a definite must-see!
1712 Green St #1

title: Bright, cozy, and very private 2 bedroom apartment in Northern Liberti
description:
Bright, cozy, and very private 2 bedroom apartment in Northern Liberties. This renovated bi-level owner's unit on the quaint N Lawrence Street takes up two floors of a three-story brick end-of-row home. Enter through your own private entrance and immediately ascend up the steps onto the 2nd floor. The Main Level consists of the Living Room with a fireplace, the Kitchen, and the bright Dining Room with five windows. A totally renovated Kitchen features all new cabinets, quartz countertops and new stainless steel appliances, including a 6-burner range , a dishwasher, and a French-door bottom-freezer refrigerator. Also on the second floor is the utility room with new washer and dryer. The 3rd floor is reached via a spiral stair and features two generous bedrooms - one with cathedral ceilings - and a fully renovated full bath. A/C, Nest thermostat, Ring security system. Located on a quiet street, this rental is within walking distance to all Northern Liberties has to offer. Tenant responsible for all utilities. First, last month rent, and SD required. title: Beautiful Apt in One of the City's Most Desirable Neighborhoods!
description:
A beautiful apartment in one of the city's most desirable neighborhoods! Enter this bi-level unit and discover the hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, high ceilings with installed speakers, and large energy efficient windows which provide ample natural light. The spacious, open living and dining space offers plenty of room for entertaining friends and family, and showcases the gorgeous kitchen, which includes granite counters and large island, stainless steel appliances, and a beautifully tiled backsplash. Continue past the kitchen to find the beautifully tiled bathroom with tub and shower combo, and separate stall shower with frameless glass enclosure, both with dual showerheads. The floor also includes a sun drenched bedroom with a walk in closet and access to a patio- just the spot for lounging on those sunny days! Downstairs features two lovely ensuite bedrooms with custom tiled bathrooms and stall showers with frameless glass enclosures. Washer and dryer are included in the unit, as well as an installed security system, and the location can't be beat- close to shops, restaurants, not to mention just minutes away from Center City. Don't wait, see this unit today!

title: Welcome to 1723 Francis Street #2G! Brought to you by "Stamm Developme
description:
Welcome to 1723 Francis Street #2G! Brought to you by Stamm Development Group and Builder, Point Builder’s and Design Concepts, this beautiful 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom unit features an open floor plan layout. The stunning in-line kitchen is equipped with walnut and white two-tone Porcelanosa cabinets, white quartz countertops, Delta Trinsic matte black fixtures, and Whirlpool stainless steel appliances! The spacious primary bedroom has a large custom built in closet, perfect for all the closet storage you could need. The primary bath has matte black fixtures, glass door entry shower, and a Porcelanosa custom vanity. This unit is complete with Smart thermostats and Latch Technology secured front entry systems. The building also features private trash/recycling room, mail and package room and a bike storage room. In close proximity to all of the restaurants, bars, and grocery stores that Francisville has to offer, schedule your showing today!

Tired of waiting on things to get fixed or things never getting fixed? renting/paying rent when you can pay half of that and own a home. Also we help pay your closing costs so that's less money you have to pay at settlement. We can get you in your new home 30-45 days as long as you are on top of your requirements. If you would like more Information, call today. It's the new year. Let's help you accomplish something.

Located on a quiet street in the heart of Fishtown at the Rag Flats. This contemporary style home was built with eco-friendly focus featuring radiant floor heating, rain-collection cistern stored underneath the development, and porous pavers. You can enter through the secure, gated entrance on E Berk Street or from the driveway located on E Wilt Street. Stepping inside you are greeted with an open concept floor plan and very unique design. Sliding doors in the dining room provide great natural light and access to the secluded garden space where you can enjoy a morning cup of coffee or tea. The kitchen features wood cabinets, stainless steel appliances, soapstone countertops with a convenient built in pantry. The 2nd floor primary bedroom is very spacious with ample closet space and easy access to the large patio space. In-suite full bathroom includes modern finishes and energy efficient windows. Stepping up to the 3rd floor there is a sitting area perfect for a home office space, two additional bedrooms with bamboo floors, and a very spacious full bath with tub. From the sitting area you have access to the Astro turfed roof deck with 360 view of center city and the neighborhood. The roof deck features a dumbwaiter that connects from the rooftop to the kitchen making the amount of entertaining endless while being surrounded by stunning views. Fully finished basement with built-in wall shelving provides additional great space for entertaining. There is ample hidden storage behind built in shelves, laundry area & a third full bathroom with shower stall. Landlord pays for water. Available starting March 1st! While enjoying the quite of the community, this rental is still only a few blocks from all there is to offer on Frankford Avenue, less than 10-minute walk to the delicious Philly Style Bagels, Riverwards Produce, Meyer’s Brewing Company, Cheu Fishtown & nunu and so much more!

title: A convenient, easy lifestyle beckons you to this exceptional home
description: A convenient, easy lifestyle beckons you to this exceptional home in Hershey Mill. Home was two bedroom, renovated and converted to a one bedroom with den. (Floor plan can be adjusted to suit your needs). The many updates and renovations, including to the kitchen and bathrooms, make this home a pretty, welcoming oasis. While summer days may seem far now, the private pool at Eaton Village is a wonderful plus during warm weather, as is the patio. Close to everything, and located within historic Chester County, Hersheys Mill has so much to offer, with its low-maintenance, carefree lifestyle a real draw. The parking spot and garage with man door are close to the home. From the front door, with a recently replaced storm door, the wood-floored foyer leads you into this lovely abode. The open-concept living room/dining room area has a vaulted ceiling with a window, and a wood-burning fireplace for cozy cool evenings. Sliders lead to the private patio, with plenty of room for summer barbequing and entertaining. From the living room/dining area, the recently improved kitchen is both pretty and wonderfully functional, with clean, white cabinets and Corian countertops, stainless steel appliances, and attractive wood floors. The charming breakfast area has a large window with a pretty view; the table and chairs are also available for sale with the home. A pantry closet allows for extra storage here as well. The main, carpeted bedroom is attractive, with lovely windows and two closets for plenty of storage. The main bath, recently renovated, has an oversized, step-in shower. The vanity is particularly eye-catching, with a marbled top and lots of drawers. The second bedroom, currently used as a den, is carpeted, with a nice closet and windows. There are also pull-down stairs here for attic storage. A recently renovated powder room is located just off the hall. Outside, the lovingly landscaped patio is perfect for enjoying nature. The garage, just a short walk from the front door, also has a man door for additional access. There are numerous amenities at Hersheys Mill, including a Community Center, library, pool, golf course, tennis courts, wood shop, walking trails, and opportunities for trips to museums and other attractions. There are so many group activities available, which makes the community appealing for social residents. For quieter pursuits, including birdwatching, the private walking trails are wonderful. Eaton Village, attractive and well-cared for, has newer siding, roofs, and walkways. The village also offers a private pool for exercise and cooling days during the summertime. Located within historic Chester County, Hersheys Mill is within easy access to the towns of Malvern and West Chester, as well as major thoroughfares, including West Chester Pike and Route 202. Its location is also close to Peoples Light theater, shops, restaurants, and parks, including East Goshen Park, a particularly pretty spot. Welcome to Hersheys Mill!

title: Furnished One Bedroom En Suite Bathroom W/Laundry
description:
2001 Hamilton St #920 is city living at its best — a fantastic location, garage parking, and great building amenities! Located in the North Tower of Fairmount's highly sought-after CityView Condominium, this unit is an updated 1 bed, 1 bath, with an assigned garage parking spot. Entering the pristinely kept building, you're greeted by an attendant at the front welcome desk that's staffed 24/7. Inside the unit, hardwood floors stretch across the living room, where oversized windows, showcasing stunning skyline views, fill the space with natural light. Off the entry hall, the large kitchen is fitted with white cabinetry, granite countertops, and plenty of storage and prep space. Likewise, the home's full bathroom has coordinating counters and cabinetry. Completing the home is a spacious, carpeted bedroom with the same mesmerizing views as the living room and a huge walk-in closet. Washer dryer are at the end of the hall. In addition to the building's amenities, including a fitness center, and a pool, the condo fee covers electric and water. I work in logistics and I work full time and currently separating from my husband. We need some space from each other while also juggling children and business responsibilities. I'm 49yrs old with 2 kids, 25 & 20. Looking for a clean subtenant to live in the place temporarily as I am back to DE for work until September. So at this point, I would like to go month to month indefinitely.
Dawn

title: Nicest 1 bedroom in Wissahickon/Roxborough - 2095/mo March 8th move-in
description:
Spacious new construction 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment tucked away in the highly coveted Wissahickon section of Roxborough. Conveniently located within walking distance to the Wissahickon Park and Wissahickon Train Station/Transit Center and a 2-minute drive to I-76 and Main Street, Manayunk.
1 Bed/1 Bath, 1000 sqft, brand new renovation, with expected move-in March 8th. Apartment features an open-plan living space with a large chef's kitchen, island with bar seating, garbage disposal and granite countertops. Multiple storage spaces throughout the apartment. Massive bedroom features two windows and a huge closet. Bathroom with 48" vanity, washer and dryer, and large shower with floor-to-ceiling tile and glass shower door. Huge windows throughout the apartment allow for lots of natural light and city skyline/neighborhood views. This apartment could not be more ideally located.
The Wissahickon section is a quiet and incredibly friendly neighborhood with little traffic, easy parking, and quick access to all public transit and major roadways. This apartment's greatest feature is its 30-second proximity to the Wissahickon Park. Sprawling over 1800 acres with 23 miles of looped trail, this apartment's location is a must for anyone who enjoys to hike or bike the trails.

Move-in ready!

title: This 3 bed 3 bath Brewerytown apt will please your senses
description:
3106 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath home with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.
The first bedroom (10’7″ x 9’6″) sits at the front part of the main level and while big windows are obvious at first sight, ample closet space are one of its best assets! A full bathroom with a stand up shower also sits on the main level. Discover an extravagant kitchen with quartz countertops, sleek white cabinetry, a breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including: a refrigerator, microwave, gas stove, dishwasher–which create an ideal setting for meal preparation. The kitchen and living room area make up a bright and open concept floorplan and just off the living room a back entrance/exit which leads out to the driveway wherein your own parking space exists to relieve the parking woes we the citizens of Philadelphia have had bestowed upon us.
The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.
Features:
Central Air/Heat
Washer Dryer
Parking space
2 entrances
Dishwasher
Gas stove
3 full bathrooms
Tons of natural light
